title: SLANG Worldwide CEO Chris Driessen
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Chris Driessen, CEO at SLANG Worldwide talks about being focused on the tremendous opportunity in US cannabis. Speaking the language of CPG, reliance on data, consumer analytics. Small nuance in between markets, but largely same series of events. Share price volatility. Growth in enterprise value and clever consolidation. Learn more about your ad choices.
